references.reason: This paper is a technical report on GPT-4, a large language model that is highly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: LLM Comparative Assessment: Zero-shot NLG Evaluation through Pairwise Comparisons using Large Language Models
references.reason: This paper presents a novel approach for evaluating large language models using pairwise comparisons, which directly addresses one of the limitations of existing methods.

references.paper_title: When Benchmarks are Targets: Revealing the Sensitivity of Large Language Model Leaderboards
references.reason: This paper highlights the sensitivity of large language model leaderboards to various factors, which is highly relevant to the concerns about order dependency addressed in the current work.

references.paper_title: Make Your LLM Fully Utilize the Context
references.reason: This paper explores ways to improve context utilization in LLMs, a topic closely related to the order-independence problem tackled in the current work.
This paper provides a technical report on PaLM 2, a large language model which provides context for the current work which investigates the order independence of large language models.
